about_the_game:
Brawler/Platformer Party game, for 2 to 4 players.
Each player got 4 controls corresponding in the 4 directions. Those controls can be assigned freely, on keyboard and/or controllers.
Players choose to incarnate a character. In addition to movement combos, each character has its own specificity : Controls sequence can trigger special and unique moves.
The environment is interactive and players will learn how to use it in order to overcome their opponents.
detailed_description:
Brawler/Platformer Party game, for 2 to 4 players.
Each player got 4 controls corresponding in the 4 directions. Those controls can be assigned freely, on keyboard and/or controllers.
Players choose to incarnate a character. In addition to movement combos, each character has its own specificity : Controls sequence can trigger special and unique moves.
The environment is interactive and players will learn how to use it in order to overcome their opponents.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Core i5 4th Gen
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Core i7 4th Gen
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

name: Jump'n'Brawl Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Core i5 4th Gen
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7 4th Gen
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Fast paced brawler/platformer game in Local PvP. From 2 to 4 players, incarnate characters with unique abilities and fight in interactive arenas.
